channel.title: R on Stats and R
channel.description: Recent content in R on Stats and R

item.title: How to install R and RStudio?
item.description: What is R and RStudio? How to use RStudio? What is R and RStudio? R is nothing more than a programming language. At the time of writing, this language is (one of) the leading program in statistics, although not the only programming language used by statisticians. In order to use R, we need two things: a text editor in which to write our code a place to run this code You can download R at www.
